title: ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD
content:
0x5A039BB0BCA604B60xC6F43D0E// AddBlipForCoord
Blip ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD(float x, float y, float z);Parameters:x: The X coordinate to create the blip on.y: The Y coordinate.z: The Z coordinate.Returns: A blip handle.Creates a blip for the specified coordinates. You can use SET_BLIP_ natives to change the blip.Examples:Lualocal destination = AddBlipForCoord(200.0, 200.0, 5.0)
codeBlocks:
// AddBlipForCoord
Blip ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD(float x, float y, float z);
